title: Clear noon, slow city driving with frequent braking.
caption: A blue car drives down a city street with tall buildings on either side, braking frequently.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and braking frequently, likely due to the high density of other vehicles and pedestrians in the area.
